20110111233241.000|20110111233247.000|CC1|NIRO'S CREASED CHARACTER --     
20110111233247.000|20110111233248.000|CC1|CRAZED CHARACTER IN THE MOVIE   
20110111233248.000|20110111233251.000|CC1|TAXI DRIVER.

20110111233738.000|20110111233739.000|CC1|CLOSED DOWN AS A RESULT OF THE
